sqlList.sql: select lp.ID, lp.GROUP_CODE AS GROUPCODE, lp.NAME_ZH AS GROUPNM, lp.DESCRIPTION_ZH AS GROUPDESC, (CASE lp.BANDTYPE WHEN 'H' THEN '豪华型' WHEN 'J' THEN '经济型' ELSE '无' END ) as GROUPTYPE, lp.STATUS, (CASE lp.status WHEN '0' THEN '下线' WHEN '1' THEN '上线' ELSE '' END ) as ONLINEDIS, lp.BANDTYPE from t_lm_b_hotelgroup lp where ((:ID IS NULL) OR (lp.id = :ID)) order by lp.ID desc
select lm.GROUP_CODE AS GROUPCODE,lm.NAME_ZH AS GROUPNM from t_lm_b_hotelgroup lm where (lm.GROUP_CODE = :GROUPCODE) OR (lm.NAME_ZH = :GROUPNM)
select lm.GROUP_CODE AS GROUPCODE,lm.NAME_ZH AS GROUPNM from t_lm_b_hotelgroup lm where (lm.ID <> :ID) AND (lm.NAME_ZH = :GROUPNM)

INSERT INTO T_LM_B_HOTELGROUP (ID, GROUP_CODE, NAME_ZH,DESCRIPTION_ZH, BANDTYPE, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) VALUES (:ID, :GROUPCODE, :NAMEZH,:DESCRIPTIONZH,:BANDTYPE, :ONLINESTATUS, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
update t_lm_b_hotelgroup set group_code = :GROUPCODE, name_zh = :NAMEZH, description_zh = :DESCRIPTIONZH, bandtype = :BANDTYPE, status = :ONLINESTATUS, update_time = sysdate where id = :ID
